statements: DELETE FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE age < 30 AND churn_likelihood > 0.5;
DELETE FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE customer_id = 101 AND age > 30;
DELETE FROM customer_churn_prediction WHERE subscription_duration < 6 OR churn_likelihood > 0.6;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE id = 12345 AND email = 'example@email.com';
DELETE FROM churn_prediction WHERE customer_id = 54321 AND prediction_score > 0.8;
DELETE FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 101 AND product_id = 201;
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 50 AND customer_churned = TRUE;
